categories: Category:Star Wars: Return of the Jedi

nodes.text: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi 4: The Final Duel is the fourth issue of the Star Wars: Return of the Jedi mini-series and is part of the Marvel Star Wars series of comic books.
Part four of a four issue mini-series of the Return of the Jedi movie adaptation.
Unlike the other two previous Marvel Star Wars Movie Adaptations, A New Hope & The Empire Strikes Back, this was not part of the regular series.

There are five pin-up pages in this issue, Admiral Gial Ackbar, Logray, B-wing starfighter, Luke Skywalker & Darth Vader by Rick J. Bryant & Yoda, Anakin Skywalker & Obi-Wan Kenobi by Bill Sienkiewicz.
The Ewok who steals the Imperial speeder bike is incorrectly identified as Wicket Wystri Warrick in the story but it is actually Paploo.

If you're one of the two or three people out there who doesn't know the ending to this latest, greatest STAR WARS epic — or even if you do — you'll still enjoy the conclusion to the most sensational space saga of all!
The Rebels attempt to destroy the Death Star II while Luke Skywalker duels with Darth Vader.
